about_the_game:
In the both colorful and dangerous world of Brick-Force, the right piece of equipment can make the difference between life and death. Whether it be weapons, Elite Gems or stylish clothing – the valuable Starter Pack brings you enough cash to get your own awesome gear.

With 5,000 Tokens and Force-Points each, a simple Brick-Soldier can become part of the elite in no time and spread fear and terror among his foes.
detailed_description:
In the both colorful and dangerous world of Brick-Force, the right piece of equipment can make the difference between life and death. Whether it be weapons, Elite Gems or stylish clothing – the valuable Starter Pack brings you enough cash to get your own awesome gear.

With 5,000 Tokens and Force-Points each, a simple Brick-Soldier can become part of the elite in no time and spread fear and terror among his foes.

name: Brick-Force: Starter DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 3200+ / Intel Pentium 4 3200+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X2 255 / Intel Pentium E 5500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon ™ HD 3850 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher

short_description: In the both colorful and dangerous world of Brick-Force, the right piece of equipment can make the difference between life and death. Whether it be weapons, Elite Gems or stylish clothing – the valuable Starter Pack brings you enough cash to get your own awesome gear.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
